3rd Party OS "Personality" Boards  

 

  

 

 

 

Unknown OS Board

Front

Back

 

The above OS board is unknown. It has no markings indicating what company may have made the board.  There is no date code either. The board was found among Atari 1200 (not XL) 1st Article parts from an abandoned Atari office.

The board contains 2 Eprom Sockets which are empty, a pair of 2K Static Memory chips and an additional empty footprint for another chip.   It also has an on/off switch.

If anyone has additional information on this board, please contact Curt to discuss:   CLICK HERE
